title: 39j01 - Equivalent position.
text:
Equivalent position
means a position that is virtually identical to the employee’s former position
in terms of pay, benefits and working conditions, including privileges,
perquisites and status.  The position must involve the same or substantially
similar duties and responsibilities, which require substantially equivalent
skill, effort, responsibility, and authority. 29 CFR 825.215(a)
html:
Equivalent position means a position that is virtually identical to the employee’s former position in terms of pay, benefits and working conditions, including privileges, perquisites and status.  The position must involve the same or substantially similar duties and responsibilities, which require substantially equivalent skill, effort, responsibility, and authority.

 

29 CFR 825.215(a)
